title: Sri Lanka’s Basil Rajapaksa meets Indian Prime Minister Modi
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka’s Finance Minister Basil Rajapaksa has met with Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Wednesday (16) afternoon at the Indian Parliamentary Complex.
The Finance Minister had thanked the Indian Prime Minister for the financial assistance India is providing to Sri Lanka.

Further, PM Modi was invited by the Sri Lankan Minister to attend the much-awaited BIMSTEC or Bay of Bengal Initiative for Multi-Sectoral Technical and Economic Cooperation be hosted by Sri Lanka on 30th March.
